# Spectral Functions

[TOC]

The [`tf.spectral`](../../api_docs/python/tf/spectral.md) module supports several spectral decomposition operations
that you can use to transform Tensors of real and complex signals.

<h2 id="Discrete_Fourier_Transforms">Discrete Fourier Transforms</h2>

*   [`tf.spectral.fft`](../../api_docs/python/tf/fft.md)
*   [`tf.spectral.ifft`](../../api_docs/python/tf/ifft.md)
*   [`tf.spectral.fft2d`](../../api_docs/python/tf/fft2d.md)
*   [`tf.spectral.ifft2d`](../../api_docs/python/tf/ifft2d.md)
*   [`tf.spectral.fft3d`](../../api_docs/python/tf/fft3d.md)
*   [`tf.spectral.ifft3d`](../../api_docs/python/tf/ifft3d.md)
*   [`tf.spectral.rfft`](../../api_docs/python/tf/spectral/rfft.md)
*   [`tf.spectral.irfft`](../../api_docs/python/tf/spectral/irfft.md)
*   [`tf.spectral.rfft2d`](../../api_docs/python/tf/spectral/rfft2d.md)
*   [`tf.spectral.irfft2d`](../../api_docs/python/tf/spectral/irfft2d.md)
*   [`tf.spectral.rfft3d`](../../api_docs/python/tf/spectral/rfft3d.md)
*   [`tf.spectral.irfft3d`](../../api_docs/python/tf/spectral/irfft3d.md)

<h2 id="Discrete_Cosine_Transforms">Discrete Cosine Transforms</h2>

*   [`tf.spectral.dct`](../../api_docs/python/tf/spectral/dct.md)
